page.mod_title: Course Introduction and CHK Search Overview

text_content.paragraph: CHK Search provides a one-stop shop for wells, sites, contracts and leases data that’s easily accessible, and easily exported to Excel.

graphic.alt: Collage of the 4 CHK Search tabs: Wells-Sites, Contracts, Leases and Maps.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: CHK Search provides a one-stop shop for wells, sites, contracts and leases data that’s easily accessible, and easily exported to Excel.
